work.name: Banprocesos Outsourcing Services
work.summary: I carried out my professional practice in this company, where I designed and implemented a work agenda on the intranet for employees. This tool allowed greater efficiency in the organization and understanding of daily work, which facilitated the management of time and tasks of employees.
highlights: Developed Equipment Inventory Management System (C#, Typescript, HTML, CSS, ASP.NET and SQL)
Developed SQL scripts to Insert, Update, Delete and Merge data in the database tables along with SQL joins and cursors.

volunteer.summary: Thanks to my passion for computer maintenance, I decided to open my own business where I provide technical assistance to my clients. My main focus is to perform preventive maintenance and repair any kind of technical problems in my clients' computer systems. In addition, I also offer software installation, upgrading and formatting services, to ensure that my clients have an optimal experience with their computers and can get the most out of them.

projects.name: Automated Teller Machine
projects.description: This is a project that consisted of creating a simulation of an ATM that reads an amount indicated by the user, and the ATM delivered the minimum amount of bills.

projects.name: Supreme Store
projects.description: Programming of a virtual store about a clothing brand. Where it contains sections for both the company's information and to show their products in a creative way.

projects.name: Bank Project
projects.description: Programming of an application for a bank, where you can take a better organization of customers, users, the movements that customers have in terms of their money, and various reports that can make a person to see the information you want.

projects.name: Control of Credit Sales in a Supermarket
projects.description: Programming of an application for the control of credit sales in a supermarket. With the purpose of carrying a better organization of customer information, users, the movements that a person has with his money in the supermarket, the details of the purchases made and various reports that a person can make to see the information you want.
projects.entity: Control of Credit Sales in a Supermarket

projects.name: Sales Control of a Pharmacy
projects.description: Programming of a web page to control information in a pharmacy. With the purpose of carrying out a better organization of customer information, users, the movements that a person has with his money in the pharmacy, the details of the purchases made of medicines and other products, and ending with multiple reporting options that can make a person to see the information you have in the pharmacy on the actions you have done.

projects.name: Personal Curriculum Vitae
projects.description: Project where I made my personal resume in the form of a web page, hosted with Netlify. I did it since it seems to me a very agile and efficient way to do it, since every change I want to make or every element I want to add will be done in real time, so my resume will always be kept updated for recruiters or people who want to see it, it also has a very organized and very informative structure for visitors.

projects.name: Work Calendar
projects.description: Programming a work agenda in the intranet for the employees of the company, facilitating the organization and understanding of the work they have to do every day.
